widget.name: The Strat Pack
widget.description: The Strat Pack is a deck of cards for marketers to provoke new strategic thinking. Each card prompts a different way to think about your brand and business, allowing you to see all the opportunities available and bring a fresh twist to your marketing. At the base of each card is an example from a mainstream brand to provide a reference point. The Strat Pack is brought to you by Pretty Pragmatic, a strategic marketing agency that makes sense, sensational.
widget.author: Pretty Pragmatic
